entry.title: Tite-dri - 4"x 7" Absorbent Meat, Fish & Poultry Pad 50 Grams - 2000/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tite-Dri
Type: Disposables
Price: 59.99

Tite-dri - AC-50 - 4"x7" Absorbent Meat, Fish & Poultry Pad 50 Grams - 2000/Case

These white 4" x 7" absorbent meat, fish, and poultry pads will improve the appearance and shelf life of prepackaged meats at your deli counter or butcher shop by absorbing excess juices. By improving the appearance of your prepackaged meat products with these absorbent food pads, you'll attract more impulse purchases!

Each absorbent pad features virgin cellulose fibers for maximum absorbency, wrapped and sealed on all four sides by a polyethylene film, with perforations on one side. These 4" x 7" white absorbent meat soaker pads have a 50 gram liquid absorption capacity and comply with USDA and FDA requirements.

entry.title: Dyne-A-Pak - #12S White Foam Meat Tray 11” x 9” x 0.625” - 250/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dyne-A-Pak
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

Product Details:

Display your freshest meats, fruits, and vegetables with this foam tray! Made of sturdy, high-quality foam, this supermarket tray is perfect for arranging produce, poultry, and more to be stored or displayed in refrigerated merchandisers at your establishment. The tray's black color draws attention to the products featured inside, and can even be used for simple product identification. Whatever you use it for, this tray is a versatile option for delis, grocery stores, and similar venues.

Compatible with auto wrapping equipment, this foam tray makes packaging meats and produce easy and efficient, helping to save time and energy. Plus, when packaged, this tray is the perfect way to keep food items fresh for longer periods of time. As an added benefit, this tray is disposable, providing customers with fast and easy clean up after use! Offering sturdiness and function at an economical price, this foam supermarket tray is sure to suit your many needs.

Overall Dimensions:
11” x 9” x 0.625”
